title: Warner's Natural Herb Products
cleaned_text: From generation to generation, the knowledge and medicinal uses of herbs have been passed down. John E. Warner learned from his grandfather, John Frank Warner, and shares his knowledge on the healing and preventive powers of the herbs with his book, catalogs and herb walk videos. At Warner Herb Co., a dealer in natural herb products, we have been serving customers around the world since 1957. We offer an extensive line of herb products, extracts, capsules, herb food combinations and regular herbs.
